TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract FormRegionManifest

summary.span: 表示一个窗体区域清单，该清单描述窗体区域如何出现在 Outlook 中。

span.span: Represents a form region manifest that describes how the form region appears in Outlook.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体区域清单是说明窗体区域在 Outlook 中的显示方式的属性的集合。A form region manifest is a collection of properties that describe how the form region appears in Outlook. 例如, 您可以指定窗体区域是否应出现在 Outlook 项的 "阅读" 窗格中, 或提供您希望在用户选择替换或全部替换时在 "**操作**" 菜单或 "**选择窗体**" 对话框中显示的标题。Outlook 中的窗体区域。For example, you can specify whether the form region should appear in the Reading Pane of an Outlook item, or provide the title that you would like to appear in the **Actions** menu or **Choose Form** dialog box when users select a replacement or replace-all form region in Outlook. 您可以在设计时在 "**属性**" 窗口中设置这些属性, 也可以在运行时在 Outlook 从 outlook 外接程序中检索窗体区域清单之前进行设置。You can set these properties at design time in the **Properties** window, or at run time before Outlook retrieves the form region manifest from the Outlook add-in. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取或设置出现在 Outlook 的“选择表单”对话框中的用来表示替换和全部替换表单区域的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that appears in the **Choose Form** dialog box in Outlook for replacement and replace-all form regions.

value.span: 一个字符串, 该字符串表示在 Outlook 的 "**选择窗体**" 对话框中显示的用于替换和全部替换窗体区域的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name that appears in the **Choose Form** dialog box in Outlook for replacement and replace-all form regions.
is .

exception.span: 该值的长度大于 256 个字符。

span.span: The value is greater than 256 characters in length.

summary.span: 获取一个集合，该集合包含在显示表单区域的 Outlook 项功能区的“自定义操作”组中出现的所有自定义操作。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains all of the custom actions that appear in the **Custom Actions** group on the Ribbon of the Outlook item that displays the form region.

value.span: 一个 , 其中包含在显示窗体区域的 Outlook 项的功能区上的 "**自定义操作**" 组中出现的所有自定义操作。

span.span: A that contains all of the custom actions that appear in the **Custom Actions** group on the Ribbon of the Outlook item that displays the form region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关自定义操作的详细信息, 请参阅[Outlook 窗体区域中的自定义操作](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-actions-in-outlook-form-regions)。For more information about custom actions, see [Custom Actions in Outlook Form Regions](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-actions-in-outlook-form-regions).

summary.span: 获取或设置 Outlook 的“选择表单”对话框中出现的用来表示替换和全部替换表单区域的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears in the **Choose Form** dialog box in Outlook for replacement and replace-all form regions.

value.span: 一个字符串, 表示在 Outlook 的 "**选择窗体**" 对话框中显示的用于替换和全部替换窗体区域的文本。

span.span: A string that represents the text that appears in the **Choose Form** dialog box in Outlook for replacement and replace-all form regions.
is .

exception.span: 该值的长度大于 256 个字符。

span.span: The value is greater than 256 characters in length.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在此窗体区域前显示的窗体区域的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the form region to display before this form region.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示要在此窗体区域前显示的窗体区域的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the form region to display before this form region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 如果将属性设置为相邻窗体区域的名称, 则该窗体区域将显示在 Outlook 窗体上此窗体区域之前。For example, if you set the property to the name of an adjoining form region, that form region appears before this form region on the Outlook form. 使用窗体区域的设置此属性。Use the of the form region to set this property. 有关窗体区域名称的详细信息, 请参阅[创建 Outlook 窗体区域的准则](/visualstudio/vsto/guidelines-for-creating-outlook-form-regions)。For more information about the form region name, see [Guidelines for Creating Outlook Form Regions](/visualstudio/vsto/guidelines-for-creating-outlook-form-regions).

span.span: is .

exception.span: 该值的长度大于 256 个字符。

span.span: The value is greater than 256 characters in length.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体区域是否由派生的邮件类显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the form region is displayed by derived message classes.

value.span: 如果窗体区域不是由派生的邮件类显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the form region is not displayed by derived message classes; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，自定义 message 类继承 message 基类的所有窗体区域关联。By default, a custom message class inherits all the form region associations of the base message class. 例如，名为 `IPM.Task.Contoso` 的 message 类派生自 `IPM.Task`。For example, a message class named `IPM.Task.Contoso` derives from `IPM.Task`. 因此，`IPM.Task.Contoso` 继承 `IPM.Task` 的窗体区域关联。Therefore, `IPM.Task.Contoso` inherits the form region associations of `IPM.Task`. 如果不希望窗体区域与任何派生的 message 类关联，将窗体区域的 属性设置为 `true`。If you do not want the form region to be associated with any derived message classes, set the property of the form region to `true`. 例如，如果将一个相邻的窗体区域与 `IPM.Task` 关联并将 属性设置为 `true`，窗体区域只会追加到标准任务窗体的底部。For example, if you associate an adjoining form region with `IPM.Task` and set the property to `true`, the form region will only be appended to the bottom of a standard task form. 窗体区域不会追加到任何自定义版本的标准任务窗体的底部。The form region will not be appended to the bottom of any customized versions of a standard task form.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取或设置出现在 Outlook 项的功能区中或相邻窗体区域的标题文本中的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on the Ribbon of an Outlook item or in the header text of an adjoining form region.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含出现在 Outlook 项的功能区中或相邻窗体区域的标题文本中的文本。

span.span: A string that contains the text that appears on the Ribbon of an Outlook item or in the header text of an adjoining form region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于单独的窗体区域, 此文本显示在 Outlook 项的功能区上的 "**消息**" 选项卡的 "**显示**" 组中。For separate form regions, this text appears in the **Show** group of the **Message** tab on the Ribbon of the Outlook item. 对于相邻的窗体区域, 此文本显示在窗体区域的标题文本中。For adjoining form regions, this text appears in the header text of the form region. 对于替换和全部替换窗体区域, 此文本显示在 Outlook 的 "**选择窗体**" 对话框和 "**操作**" 菜单中。For replacement and replace-all form regions, this text appears in the **Choose Form** dialog box and the **Actions** menu in Outlook.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 该值的长度大于 256 个字符。

span.span: The value is greater than 256 characters in length.

span.span: Gets or sets a that specifies the icons that appear for separate, replacement, or replace-all form regions.

value.span: 一个 ，指定为单独的、替换和全部替换窗体区域显示的图标。

span.span: A that specifies the icons that appear for separate, replacement, or replace-all form regions.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Outlook 在加载此窗体区域之前是否加载旧版窗体。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Outlook loads legacy forms before loading this form region.

value.span: 如果 Outlook 在加载此窗体区域之前加载旧版窗体，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Outlook loads legacy forms before loading this form region; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您将窗体区域与自定义邮件类关联并启用此属性, 则在 Outlook 中设计并且与同一邮件类关联的任何窗体也将加载。If you associate a form region with a custom message class and enable this property, any forms that are designed in Outlook and are associated with the same message class will also load. 此属性仅影响替换和全部替换窗体区域。This property only affects replacement and replace-all form regions. 启用此属性可能会导致性能稍微降低。Enabling this property can cause a slight loss in performance.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 的属性是否可以修改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the properties of the can be modified.

value.span: 如果 的属性不能修改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the properties of the cannot be modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 outlook 从 outlook 外`true`接程序中检索窗体区域清单时, 此属性设置为。This property is set to `true` when Outlook retrieves the form region manifest from the Outlook add-in.

summary.span: 获取或设置单独的、替换和全部替换窗体区域的键盘快捷方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of separate, replacement, and replace-all form regions.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示单独的、替换和全部替换窗体区域的键盘快捷方式。

span.span: A string that represents the keyboard shortcut of separate, replacement, and replace-all form regions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串的长度必须介于1到2个字符之间, 并且不能包含空格、制表符或换行符。The string must be from 1 to 2 characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 您可以使用此键盘快捷方式作为访问键组合来激活单独的、替换或全部替换窗体区域。You can use this keyboard shortcut as an access key combination to activate a separate, replacement, or replace-all form region. 对于单独的窗体区域, 按 ALT 键时, Outlook 项的功能区上将显示键盘快捷方式。For a separate form region, the keyboard shortcut appears on the Ribbon of an Outlook item when you press the ALT key.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 该值的长度大于 2 个字符或包含非字母数字字符。

span.span: The value is greater than 2 characters in length or contains characters that are not alpha numeric.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 Outlook 检查器处于撰写模式时是否显示此窗体区域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to display the form region when an Outlook Inspector is in compose mode.

value.span: 如果在 Outlook 检查器处于撰写模式时显示此窗体区域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to display the form region when an Outlook Inspector is in compose mode; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您可以向项中添加内容, 则 Outlook 检查器处于撰写模式。An Outlook inspector is in compose mode if you can add content to the item. 例如, 当您打开一个新邮件项时, 该项会显示在处于撰写模式下的检查器中。For example, when you open a new mail item, the item appears in an Inspector that is in compose mode.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 Outlook 检查器处于读取模式时是否显示此窗体区域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to display the form region when an Outlook Inspector is in read mode.

value.span: 如果在 Outlook 检查器处于读取模式时显示此窗体区域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to display the form region when an Outlook Inspector is in read mode; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果无法将内容添加到项目中, Outlook 检查器处于读取模式。An Outlook Inspector is in read mode if you cannot add content to the item. 例如, 当您打开现有的邮件项时, 该项会显示在处于读取模式的检查器中。For example, when you open an existing mail item, the item appears in an Inspector that is in read mode.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在阅读窗格中显示该窗体区域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to display the form region in the Reading Pane.

value.span: 如果在阅读窗格中显示该窗体区域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to display the form region in the Reading Pane; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 阅读窗格有时称为预览窗格, 提供信息的只读视图。The Reading Pane, sometimes referred to as the Preview Pane, provides a read-only view of information. 您可以使用阅读窗格在不打开项目的情况下预览项目。You can use the Reading Pane to preview an item without opening the item. > [!NOTE] > 当项和窗体区域在阅读窗格中打开时, 添加到相邻窗体区域 (例如文本框) 的输入控件可能不会按预期方式运行。Input controls that you add to an adjoining form region, such as a text box, might not behave as expected when the item and form region are open in the Reading Pane. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[创建 Outlook 窗体区域的准则](/visualstudio/vsto/guidelines-for-creating-outlook-form-regions)。For more information, see [Guidelines for Creating Outlook Form Regions](/visualstudio/vsto/guidelines-for-creating-outlook-form-regions).

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取或设置出现在 Outlook 的“操作”菜单和“选择表单”对话框中的用来表示替换和全部替换表单区域的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that appears in the **Actions** menu and **Choose Form** dialog box in Outlook for replacement and replace-all form regions.

value.span: 表示显示在 Outlook 的 "**操作**" 菜单和 "**选择窗体**" 对话框中的文本的字符串, 用于替换和全部替换窗体区域。

span.span: A string that represents the text that appears in the **Actions** menu and **Choose Form** dialog box in Outlook for replacement and replace-all form regions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未设置该属性, 则该属性的值将显示在 Outlook 的 "**操作**" 菜单和 "**选择窗体**" 对话框中。If you do not set the property, then the value of the property appears in the **Actions** menu and the **Choose Form** dialog box in Outlook.

span.span: is .

span.span: The value is greater than 256 characters in length.

returns.span: 一个以 XML 形式表示 的字符串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建描述窗体区域的 XML 清单文件, 请使用方法。Use the method if you want to create an XML manifest file that describes the form region. 此方法返回一个字符串, 其中包含描述的元素和特性。This method returns a string that contains elements and attributes that describe the . 可以调用`ToXML` 命名空间中其他类型的方法以生成完整的 XML 清单文件。You can call the `ToXML` method of other types in the namespace to build a complete XML manifest file.
